item.title: Remote Meetup News #001
item.description:
# How is it going with Remote Meetups?
It's been a while that you have logged in our Slack Channel. I would like to just to say how we are going and the latest updates!
Doing a Remote Meetup is a little bit difficult, because users report don't have the same feeling as a real meetup. For this reason, We were looking for some tools for helping us to do that. Here, a big thanks to Carlisia Campos and William Kennedy, [GoBridge][1] in general, people from our Go branch who have found a Nice tool: [BigMarker][2].
BigMarker is a paid tool, we got a sponsorship from [Hired.com][3] which helped us to pay this Main Channel for Remote Meetup. [Channel is here!][4] Using this, the attendees interaction will be better. If you want, you can subscribe to this channel and get the latest meetups! After some meetups, we got a sponsorship from BigMarker itself and now we have a paid account up to 1000 attendees! It's awesome!
Go Branch got a sponsorship from Compose.io, which helped them to pay [their own channel][5]. It means, all the Remote Meetups from Go will be centralised in a single channel and not the Main Channel. BTW, if you want to learn Go, it's time! A lot of awesome upcoming meetups in the next weeks!
## Helping Meetups around the World
Another idea we got on-the-fly was helping meetups. We are partner of two Meetups around the world: ParisRb - the biggest meetup in Europe. Green Ruby - A cool meetup in Taipei, Taiwan! These meetups can use or channel and livestream their meetups.
## Elm Remote Meetup
[DailyDrip][6] has [planned][7] an Elm Remote Meetup. We are also partner with DailyDrip. They did the first ever Elm Remote Meetup. Video is [here][8] ## Crystal Remote Meetup
The creator of Crystal is [organizing][9] a Crystal Remote Meetup. It will be in the next motnh. Stay tunned! [1]: http://golangbridge.org [2]: https://www.bigmarker.com [3]: https://hired.com/?utm_source=sponsor&utm_medium=remotemeetup&utm_campaign=q2-16 [4]: https://www.bigmarker.com/remote-meetup [5]: https://www.bigmarker.com/remote-meetup-go [6]: https://www.dailydrip.com/ [7]: https://www.dailydrip.com/blog/organizing-a-remote-meetup-for-elm [8]: https://www.dailydrip.com/topics/elm-remote-meetup/drips/elm-remote-meetup-1 [9]: https://twitter.com/CrystalLanguage/status/743821981691314178
